name: Erica's Home
description:
Take on the role of a mother trying to survive in a desolate wasteland, scavenging to feed her daughter Erica. Erica's Home, is a game about dealing with grief and coming to terms with it. Made for Global Game Jam 2019. 

Credits: 

Programming, Narrative: Colum Higgins

Art, Narrative: Kal O'Brien

Music: Sergio Bonfiglio
